definition: commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: The surveyor’s report indicates that there has been some serious damage to some of the goods.
sentences.chinese: 商檢報告顯示有一些貨物遭到了嚴重的損毀。

sentences.english: It is required for surveyor to check draft after completion of first batch of cargo.
sentences.chinese: 第一票貨完工後需要商檢看水尺，請做好準備。

sentences.english: The survey has revealed that the damage to the goods is attributable to rough handling.
sentences.chinese: 商檢表明貨物的受損是由於野蠻裝卸所引起的。

sentences.english: Then we stick the new lable on the control of Commodity Inspection Bureau after cnee finish the new label.
sentences.chinese: 收貨人重新做好標貼後，在商檢局的監督下貼上去。

sentences.english: The CCIB survey report is forwarded herewith and we hope you will see your way to making a prompt settlement.
sentences.chinese: 附上中國商檢局的檢驗報告，希望你們儘快解決此事。

sentences.english: As much as I respect your Inspection Bureau.
sentences.chinese: 我非常尊重你們的商檢局。

sentences.english: Inspection must be conducted by recognize surveyor.
sentences.chinese: 檢驗工作必須由公認的商檢員來進行。

sentences.english: According to our survey report. the goods were carelessly packed.
sentences.chinese: 根據我們的商檢報告，貨物包裝得很馬虎。

sentences.english: Free Trade Zone, Frontier Inspection, commodity inspection, Payment Settling Bank, Shipping Market.
sentences.chinese: 保稅區，邊檢，商檢，結匯銀行，船務市場。

sentences.english: Second, positive analysis of Entry-Exit Commodity Inspection executive punishment.
sentences.chinese: 商檢行政處罰實證分析。

sentences.english: Article 5 The import and export commodities which are included in the Catalog shall be inspected by the commodity inspection authorities.
sentences.chinese: 第五條列入目錄的進出口商品，由商檢機構實施檢驗。

sentences.english: The institution of import and export commodities inspection should inspect the commodities declared for export strictly according to the regulations.
sentences.chinese: 商檢機構對報關出口的貨物應嚴格按規定進行商檢。

sentences.english: The institution of import and export commodities inspection should inspect the commodities declared for export strictly according to the regulations.
sentences.chinese: 商檢機構對報關出口的貨物應嚴格按規定進行商檢。

sentences.english: The Inspection Certificate will be signed by the commissioner of your bureau。
sentences.chinese: 檢驗證明書將由商檢局局長簽字。

sentences.english: The commissioner of your bureau will sign the Inspection Certificate.
sentences.chinese: 檢驗證明書將由商檢局局長簽字。

sentences.english: Quality Certificate by C I Q.
sentences.chinese: 證書，品質，商檢局，代辦，中國。

definition: variant of 戰略伙伴|战略伙伴[zhan4 lu:e4 huo3 ban4]
abbr. of 資訊工程|资讯工程[zi1 xun4 gong1 cheng2]
